development_principles: LLMs label and translate intent; deterministic systems retrieve and compute.
Only approved pins are truth (Map is the interface).
Enrich Once, Read Forever (Frozen by default, versioned if refreshed).
Strict Taxonomy: AI outputs must match UI Icon sets exactly.
User edits never overwrite frozen AI enrichment.

phase_1.name: The Smart Repository (Cupcake)
phase_1.goal: A deterministic, map-based database of approved places. Eliminates messy lists and taxonomy drift.

epics.title: Strict Schema, Versioning & Deduplication
epics.description: Enforce data integrity and enrichment immutability before the first pin is dropped.

tasks.task: Create strict Enums and versioned enrichment schema.
tasks.details: Category Enum: ['Food', 'Coffee', 'Sights', 'Shop', 'Activity']. Energy Enum: ['Low', 'Medium', 'High']. Add fields: enrichment_version, enriched_at, enrichment_source_hash.
Constraint: UNIQUE(user_id, google_place_id). Re-adding a place opens edit view; enrichment is not re-run.
Store raw opening_hours JSON from Google Places and source metadata for future deterministic filtering.

epics.title: The Librarian Agent (Deterministic Ingestion)
epics.description: Multi-source enrichment that is frozen, auditable, and schema-aligned.

tasks.details: Resolve via Google Places. Fetch nearby Wikipedia pages via GeoSearch. Select best match by distance + name similarity.
Pull summary, thumbnail, and structured facts via Wikidata when available. Store raw extracts.
LLM normalizes fetched data into enums and tags only. Prompt includes full enum list. Output must validate or be rejected.
Write enrichment once, mark as frozen. No AI calls during browsing, filtering, or planning.

epics.title: Aligned Visual Interface
epics.description: UI that mirrors database truth exactly.

tasks.details: Map strict DB categories to SVG assets. Any unmapped enum is a build-time error.
Display frozen AI tags and factual summaries. Allow user-added notes and user tags stored separately.

phase_2.name: The Interactive Planner (Birthday Cake)
phase_2.goal: Stateful itinerary planning using deterministic logic only.

epics.title: Stateful Planning (Kanban)
features: Trip State Machine: Backlog -> Scheduled -> Done.
Drag-and-Drop between day buckets updates scheduling fields only.
Scheduling actions never trigger enrichment or AI calls.
Visual distinction for scheduled vs unscheduled pins.

epics.title: Deterministic Filtering & Intent Translation
features: Intent Extraction Agent outputs filter JSON only (never SQL).
Filtering executed entirely via DB queries.
Open Now filtering uses server time vs stored opening_hours JSON.

phase_3.name: The Intelligent Concierge (Wedding Cake)
phase_3.goal: Optimization and discovery without compromising trust.

epics.title: Deterministic Routing
features: Route Optimization via OSRM or Google Routes API.
Travel-time badges rendered between scheduled items.
LLMs are not involved in routing or timing.

epics.title: Gated Discovery (Staging Area)
features: Discovery uses deterministic search + filters first.
Optional AI summarization of discovered items (no sourcing).
Results appear as Ghost Pins (non-truth state).
User approval triggers full enrichment and moves item to Backlog.
Rejected items are discarded and never stored.
